content.question: Which of the following best explains the views expressed in the passage?

choices.label: The arrival of migrants from communist countries in Eastern Europe led to concerns over West German economic stability.
The economic downturn of the 1970s encouraged the rise of populist right-wing nationalism in much of Europe.
The expansion of the European Union caused controversy over the balance between national identity and international integration.
The emergence of the United States and Soviet Union as superpowers led many European nations to reconsider their global political and economic roles.

content.answer: The economic downturn of the 1970s encouraged the rise of populist right-wing nationalism in much of Europe.

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
